
$ORIGIN example1.com.
$TTL 1800

example1.com.		IN	SOA	ns1.example1.com. hostmaster.example1.com. (2017032300 7200 1800 1209600 1800)
_25._tcp		IN	TLSA	3 0 1 TLSA_KEY_FILE_NOT_FOUND_AT_
_443._tcp		IN	TLSA	3 0 1 TLSA_KEY_FILE_NOT_FOUND_AT_
mail._domainkey		IN	TXT	( "v=DKIM1; k=rsa; s=email; "
          "p=1234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890"
          "1234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012" )
example1.com.		IN	NS	ns1.example1.com.
example1.com.		IN	MX	10 mail1.endfirst.com.
example1.com.		IN	MX	20 mail2.endfirst.com.
example1.com.		IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:_spf.endfirst.com -all"
_dmarc.example1.com.		IN	TXT	"v=DMARC1; p=quarantine; rua=mailto:dmarc-report@endfirst.com"
